title: Very Long Waiting Times in Team Builder
body:
Hey!

I moved last month from North America to Japan, so I thought it would be also a good idea to move my account to the oceanic server, because everybody was always asleep when I started gaming.

So my problem now is, that I can't find a team, no mater which champion or role I choose, I don't match with a group. Also the expected waiting time is always VERY LONG for all Champs!!!

Is this due to the network problems you have or is this my account? Does anybody else have this problem?

By the way, Blindpick works fine.

I tried ( all for more than 15min):

- Ashe, bot, marksman
-Blitzcrank, bot, support
-Yi, jungle, assasin
-Fiddlestick, mid, mage

Please help!

EDIT: Blindpick also stopped working for me, see attachment!

replies.body:
I am lvl17, so there's not the possibility to play RANKED and blind pick is just the most annoying thing, when you have to play with noobs all the time.

I did check it in a different wifi and it's the same here, whats going on?!?!

Use the "Reply" feature of the boards to give notification to the people you reply to.

The players who are found and sorted into teams use the same algorithms in all Teambuilder, Blind Pick and Ranked. There wouldn't be any discrepancy in the average skill level of players found, only the standard deviation of them.
Teambuilder is just crap, don't use it.
